nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member timeFilters is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.
nml_option.possible_values: 'dt' because filtering should be performed at each time step.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the timeFilters analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the timeFilters analysis member should use to perform restarts.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_initialize_filters
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if filters should be initialized on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_tau
nml_option.description: Cutoff time scale $\tau$ for high and low pass filtering (default is 90 days).
nml_option.possible_values: Any time stamp in 'DD_hh:mm:ss' format. Items can be removed from the left if they are unused.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeFilters_compute_cell_centered_values
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if cell centered values should be computed.
